summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North and East Fifty-eighth Street, from Kensington Place to Latona Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2308 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
